About Me

I am a graduate student in Robotics Engineering at Worcester Polytechnic Institute, MA, USA. I completed my Bachelor's degree in Mechanical Engineering from University of Pune, India. Prior to my education at WPI, I have worked as a Research and Development Engineer at Robolab Technologies.
